mapper.sql: id, shcool_id, college_id, classes_id, student_name, student_number, term, sex, start_year, birthday, grade_number, national_code, id_card, address
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from student
order by ${orderByClause}

select student.id as id, student.student_name as student_name, student.student_number as student_number, student.sex as sex, student.shcool_id as shcool_id, student.college_id as college_id, student.start_year as start_year, student.classes_id as classes_id, student.birthday as birthday, student.grade_number as grade_number, student.national_code as national_code, student.id_card as id_card, student.address as address, student.term as term, school.school_name as school, college.college_name as college, classes.class_name as classes from student, school, college, classes where student.shcool_id=#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and student.shcool_id=school.id and student.college_id=college.id and student.classes_id=classes.id

select student.id as id, student.student_name as student_name, student.student_number as student_number, student.sex as sex, student.shcool_id as shcool_id, student.college_id as college_id, student.start_year as start_year, student.classes_id as classes_id, student.birthday as birthday, student.grade_number as grade_number, student.national_code as national_code, student.id_card as id_card, student.address as address, student.term as term, school.school_name as school, college.college_name as college, classes.class_name as classes from student, school, college, classes where student.college_id=#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and student.shcool_id=school.id and student.college_id=college.id and student.classes_id=classes.id

select student.id as id, student.student_name as student_name, student.student_number as student_number, student.sex as sex, student.shcool_id as shcool_id, student.college_id as college_id, student.start_year as start_year, student.classes_id as classes_id, student.birthday as birthday, student.grade_number as grade_number, student.national_code as national_code, student.id_card as id_card, student.address as address, student.term as term, school.school_name as school, college.college_name as college, classes.class_name as classes from student, school, college, classes where student.classes_id=#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and student.shcool_id=school.id and student.college_id=college.id and student.classes_id=classes.id
mapper.insert: insert into student (id, shcool_id, college_id, classes_id, student_name, student_number, term, sex, start_year, birthday, grade_number, national_code, id_card, address) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shcoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gradeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nationalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update student
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shcool_id = #{record.shcoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
college_id = #{record.collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classes_id = #{record.classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_name = #{record.studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_number = #{record.studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
term = #{record.term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_year = #{record.startYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update student set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shcool_id = #{record.shcoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college_id = #{record.collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classes_id = #{record.classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_name = #{record.studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_number = #{record.studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{record.term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_year = #{startYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, grade_number = #{gradeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, national_code = #{nationalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update student
shcool_id = #{shcoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classes_id = #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

start_year = #{startYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student set shcool_id = #{shcoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classes_id = #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_year = #{startYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, grade_number = #{gradeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, national_code = #{nationalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from student ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
